content_1_part_1: Qamaglluki states-eni iwerngaqun North Dakota ilasaghqagut nakmikivagilgafsi nakmikilleghmi. Nakmighhu state-en nalighmeng territory-n ifkaqayugmi minyumi naalkennaluki liilightuusat elpenun ayuqelghiit.
content_1_part_2: Amarakaghmiit kiyaghlleghhiit U.S.-ngunghilngughmi, ilalluteng U.S.-em armingi nengllugutkullghiit, ilaasaghngaaghmeng nakmikimun enkaam aapsaghngaaghmeng aviilluteng nakmikusimeng imighluku Federal Post Card-em Igaa (FPCA). Amarakam armingita nengllugutangi, ilangistun maligusaghqagut U.S.-em nakmikistengita maligsaghqiit ilannaluteng ama aapnaluteng nakmikusimeng. Wata liitaghaghyukuvek takugu %link%.
content_2_part_1: Iingunaanun tuunvigituq nakmikimun ilatelleghmun. Nakmikistet allulluteng state-enillu territory-nilu maligsaghqaqiit ellmeng katam nakmikistem ilatellghanun liilightuusaatneng. Nakmighhu state-en nalighmeng territory-n ifkaqayugmi minyumi naalkennaluku nakmikistem ilatellghan tuunviga.
content_2_part_2: Qamaglluki state-et iwerngaqun North Dakota ilatesaghqaqiit yugyaget nakmikiyukata. Ilangi states-em ilasaghqaqniit 30 aghneq nakmikillghem sivungani, ilangi enkaam ilatestaqiit tawavek Nakmikilleghem aghneghanun. Megnunaghtuq liisimakelleghqan liilightuusii state-egpek.
content_3_part_1: Nakmighhu state-en nalighmeng territory-n ifkaqayugmi minyumi esghaghnaluku ilatellghen state-egpek tuunvigan sivungani. 30 aghneghuyaghngaaghmi sivutghaghlluku nakmikillghem.
content_3_part_2: Amalleqa esghaqaghluku ilatellghen igaqumakuni “inactive” (igleghangunghilnguq). Tawaten lliighyaghngaaghpek ayuquten nakmiillghisimakuvek tawan maalgugegneng kavemem nakmikillghanunllu ama nakmikillghem qepghaghtengitallu tuqlughnaqutkesimakangaten.
content_3_part_3: Igleghangunghilngulleq quunpeng ilanneqiggneghisaghngata. Wataqaaghaq sayaghqalguughnguq nakmikinqigsaghqaghhnaluten. State-egpek nakmikillghem website-angan kayusiinnaghaten allangughtelleghqaa igleghamun.
content_3_part_4: Nallghughqengngwaaghluku ilasimaten aatghen elqughulluku address-enllu ama party-gpek ilatngallgha. Takugu state-egpek ilatfigan qukfignegha ilanneqiggnaluten nalighmeng elqughsaghqalgukuvek.
content_4_part_1: Nakmikigu state-en nalighmeng territory-n ifkaqayugmi minyumi esghaghnaluku nakmikistem ilatellgha, saamallu political-em party-ksukan, pilgukuvek. Takugu state-egkpek nakmikillghan ilatfigan website-enga simighnaluki.
content_4_part_2: State-egpegun ayuquq, aapseqngwaten party-gpek ilatnguluten nakmikimun.
content_4_part_3: Nakmikillghem igleghutellgha tawatetngwaaghtuq natesaghngaan party-ksukan. Nakmiksaghngaaghpegu nakmiksaghqaq alngunak party-nilnguq nakmikilleghpigaghni, tawanlenguq nakmikisaghqat kanaghhnaqelghiit qepghaghvignun. Party-gpek natetulnga pitnguuq nakmikinaqneghpek wetku %link%.
content_5_part_1: Ilatkuvek nakmikimun, tuyughlleqaten nakmikimun ilatellghem iganeng. Una igaq kellmighqaqaa ilatnganiluten enkaam nakmikiyaghqaaghtengnganiluten. Nakmikillghem ilatellghan igaa kiyang igaqngaaq aatghen, negpek address-anga, enkaam address-anga nakmikivigem pivigkan.
content_5_part_2: Aatghen nalighmeng address-an allangughsimakuni, nakmikiyaghqaaghhnanighaseqngaten, nutaghsimakuvgu ungipan enkaam ilanneqigsimakuvek, piyaghqaakan, nutaghaghmeng nakmikistem ilatellghaneng igangnaqsengaghtuten, state-egpegun ayuquq
content_5_part_3: Kiyang kelqesanghisaghngaaghpegu nakmikistem ilatellghan igaa nakmikinaluten, iwernga ilanganeng kelgutiyaghqaayaghngaaghpek %link%.
